title: Private Garden Studio Cottage
posting_body: Brand new secluded garden studio cottage located at the top of Potrero Hill just a few blocks from Wholefoods, restaurants on 18th st, and SF General.

Approximately 375sf set in the rear yard of main 2 unit structure, the unit features bamboo floors, forced air furnace, Shaker style kitchen cabinets, gas stove, skylights, abundant attic storage, and separate side entry through a shared use yard.
Access to washer/dryer on ground floor of main building is a flat fee of $30 per month.
On the same block as the 19 bus line with reasonably available street parking, easy access to the 101 and 280 freeways and minutes from downtown.
This unit is one of a kind offering privacy and quiet from the street.
Walking score 92, Transit score 72, Bike score 61.
Rent is $2959+$30 per month with $2959 security deposit.
No smoking, no Air BnB, and no pets please.
Please email or call for showing.
